reviews.review_text: This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The ethical boundaries module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 11 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

The depth of research behind this curriculum is impressive. Every claim backed by peer-reviewed studies, which builds massive credibility with clients. The intake protocol has become my go-to for intake sessions. Thoroughly evidence-based.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The clear explanations made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied progress tracker with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 26% in 90 days. Worth every penny.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from general wellness coaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 12 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The step-by-step breakdown made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied goal-setting framework with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 99% in 2 months. Worth every penny.
Loved the role-play scenarios. Being able to discuss scope of practice with peers who 'get it' was invaluable. The form library is something I still reference constantly. Great ongoing value.

I've taken 8 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on ethical practice helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 6 weeks I had launched group programs. The community support was incredible too.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from teaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 4 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

As someone with a background in nursing, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of strengths-based and acceptance-commitment approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.

I've taken 6 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on ethical practice helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 3 months I had launched group programs. The community support was incredible too.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from teaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 6 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

As someone with a background in education, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of strengths-based and narrative therapy approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.

Decent course. The Module 2 module was fantastic, but the practice building didn't deliver as much value. The workbook could be more detailed. Still learned enough to justify the cost, but room for improvement.

I've taken 8 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on client acquisition helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 90 days I had built a waitlist. The community support was incredible too.

The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 5 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

As someone with a background in psychology, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of cognitive-behavioral and motivational interviewing approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 3 weeks after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the pricing framework from Module 2. Now charging $241 per session vs $98 before. Game changer.

I've taken 12 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on session structure helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 2 months I had doubled my rates. The community support was incredible too.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The step-by-step breakdown made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied session planner with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 86% in 2 months. Worth every penny.

Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The session planner was excellent, but advanced techniques could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.
